template.name: method 1

class mutable new-call pattern
class static methods
template.value:
class $name$(object): """ class $name$ """
# DEPRECATED @staticmethod def method1(arg): """static method1 """ if not arg: raise ValueError("Method input argument must not be empty.") assert isinstance(arg,str)
print (f"method1:{arg}")
assert arg , "Check invariant - result is not empty"
$name$.method1("12") $END$

print (f"method1:{arg}")

template.name: class immutable class (full)
class mutable new-set-call pattern
template.value:
#допускается использование открытых свойств для простых классов-данных
class $name$(object): """ new-set-call pattern of class """
def __init__(self): self.one=None self.two=None
def run(self,arg): """ method1 """ if not self.one or not self.two: raise ValueError("Object properties must not be empty.") assert isinstance(self.one,str) and isinstance(arg,self.two) if not arg: raise ValueError("Method input argument must not be empty.") assert isinstance(arg,str)
print (f"method1:{arg}")
assert arg , "Check invariant - result is not empty"
def __repr__(self): return f"{self.one} {self.two}"
obj=$name$() obj.one="11" obj.two="12" obj.run("13") $END$

template.name: class RECORD pattern 2
template.value:
#допускается использование открытых свойств для простых классов-данных
class $name$(object):
def __init__(self,$one$,$two$,$three$): self.$one$=$one$ self.$two$=$two$ self.$three$=$three$
obj=$name$(1,2,3) $END$

template.name: class RECORD pattern 1
class mutable SUPER new-call pattern
class immutable SUPER
template.value:
# __init__, __repr__, __str__ и __eq__ # __lt__, __le__, __gt__ и __ge__ # order=True # value: Any = dataclasses.field(compare=False) # __hash__() # unsafe_hash=True # title: str = "Unknown" = dataclasses.field(hash=False)
@dataclasses.dataclass(frozen=True, order=True, unsafe_hash=True) class $name$(object):
title: str = "Unknown" author: str = "Unknown author"
def __iter__(self): """ for unpacking in pattern matching """ yield self.title yield self.author
obj=$name$("one","two") $END$
